learning_outcomes: Understand and use B1 Society and Culture vocabulary
Apply B1 grammar structures in context

content.prompt_es: Une cada término con su definición correspondiente:

pairs.right: Something that is usual, typical, or standard
A traditional way of doing something
The state of being diverse; variety
